attributes.action: encourage every nation state of the world to develop a disaster preparedness plan. Cyclones, tsunamis, earthquakes - emergency relief to natural disaster areas are being hampered political crises worsening the humanitarian chaos.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
If every nation worked WITHIN NATO frameworks and the bodies of the UN, rather than attempt possibly to manage national govt WITHOUT uni - lateral input, then victims would not so acutely feel the worst effects of crises.

The petitioner is calling on the British govt, as a G8 member, to lead the way - what disaster areas need is not MORE people, but to contain the situation - possibly with technical experience. Please look at a proxy management team for co - ordinating these kinds of global efforts.

The UN has estimated of the 2.4 million people affected by the storm, about 42% had received some kind of emergency assistance. But of the two million people living in the 15 worst-affected townships, only 23% had been reached - this data is testimony to the need for an initative like the petitioner is suggesting.
